items.value: its time for real Business my friend!

Did you manage to grow?
If so, I will reward you abundantly!

If you give me 5x Ganja, you will get:
1x Little Chemical People (book)
1x Chemical Table (boxed)
1x Ghettoblaster (boxed)

Make sure you have 3x free slots in your inventory!
i need to check my Inventory first!
yes i have 5x Ganja and free space inside my Inv.

Cool thing my friend!
From now on you can run your own business.
Here you will need these things:
1x Little Chemical People (book)
1x Chemical Table (boxed)
1x Ghettoblaster (boxed)

Visit me from time to time my friend!
you can count on that, see you soon!
it's a pleasure to work with you
I think this business is too risky for me

I think, you misunderstood me!
You only get these things if you give me:
5x Ganja

come back when you have it!
